trans-unit.source: A trigger action that provides functionality for seeking (skipping) to a specified time within the active period of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个触发器操作，该操作提供查找到（跳到）<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> 的活动周期中指定时间的功能。

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard> action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to seek a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard>操作具有<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>或<xref:System.Windows.Trigger>要查找<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>。

trans-unit.source: Note that seek operations do not take the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> settings into account: the storyboard is treated as though it had a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> of 1 and no <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，查找操作不考虑情节提要的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>到帐户的设置： 情节提要将被视为具有<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>1 且无<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Seeking a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> triggers its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: 查找<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>触发器其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>事件。

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively
trans-unit.target: 暂停、 恢复、 停止或以其他方式以交互方式控制情节提要

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 为了能够暂停、 恢复或以其他方式控制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>以交互方式，设置<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>属性其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>并用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>对象 (如<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) 来控制通过引用其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>未指定，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>开始后不能以交互方式对其进行控制。

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[如何： 使用事件触发器，以控制 a 情节提要后它将开始](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)有关详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount by which the storyboard should move forward or backward from the seek origin <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置演示图板应该从查找原点 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin" /> 前进或后退的距离。

trans-unit.source: A positive or negative value that specifies the amount by which the storyboard should move forward or backward from the seek origin <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个正值或负值，该值指定演示图板应该从查找原点 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin" /> 前进或后退的距离。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: Note that seek operations do not take the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> settings into account: the storyboard is treated as though it had a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> of 1 and no <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，查找操作不考虑情节提要的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>到帐户的设置： 情节提要将被视为具有<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>1 且无<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: \<*object* <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset%2A>="[-][*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*:*seconds*[.*fractionalSeconds*]"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset%2A>="[-][*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*:*seconds*[.*fractionalSeconds*]"/>

trans-unit.source: \- or -
\<*object* <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset%2A>="[-][*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset%2A>="[-][*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*"/>

trans-unit.source: \- or -
\<*object* <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset%2A>="[-]*days*"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset%2A>="[-]*days*"/>

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: Items in square brackets (`[` and `]`) are optional.
trans-unit.target: 方括号中的项 (`[`和`]`) 都是可选的。

trans-unit.source: *days*
A value greater than or equal to 0 that describes the number of days spanned by this offset.
trans-unit.target: 一个值大于或等于 0，用于描述跨越按此偏移量的天数。

trans-unit.source: *hours*
trans-unit.target: *小时数*

trans-unit.source: A value between 0 and 23 that represents the number of hours spanned by this offset.
trans-unit.target: 一个介于 0 和 23 之间的值，表示跨越按此偏移量的小时数。

trans-unit.source: *minutes*
trans-unit.target: *分钟*

trans-unit.source: A value between 0 and 59 that represents the number of minutes spanned by this offset.
trans-unit.target: 一个介于 0 和 59 之间的值，表示跨越按此偏移量的分钟数。

trans-unit.source: *seconds*
trans-unit.target: *seconds*

trans-unit.source: A value between 0 and 59 that represents the number of seconds spanned by this offset.
trans-unit.target: 一个介于 0 和 59 之间的值，表示此偏移量跨越的秒数。

trans-unit.source: *fractionalSeconds*
trans-unit.target: *fractionalSeconds*

trans-unit.source: A value consisting of 1 to 7 digits that represents fractional seconds.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含 1 至 7 位值，表示秒的小数部分。

trans-unit.source: For the complete <xref:System.TimeSpan> syntax, see the Remarks section of the <xref:System.TimeSpan.Parse%2A> page.
trans-unit.target: 有关完整<xref:System.TimeSpan>语法，请参阅备注部分的<xref:System.TimeSpan.Parse%2A>页。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position from which this seek operation's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset" /> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个位置，此查找操作的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset" /> 从该位置开始应用。

trans-unit.source: The position from which this seek operation's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset" /> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 开始应用此查找操作的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset" /> 的位置。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin.BeginTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin.BeginTime" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset" /> property of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard" /> should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示是否应序列化此 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: **true** if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset" /> property of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard" /> should be serialized; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: 如果应序列化此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset" /> 属性，则为 true；否则为 false。
